attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years now the british public have had no say about the tv license, it has been a case of hand over your money or be prosecuted. this is totally wrong.
The BBC pride themselves on having NO adverts on their channels, but they do. 
There was a time when bbc programs used to be.....
END CREDITS: of one program,  then the..
SPINNING GLOBE: the next program on the BBC is......
OPENING CREDIT: of the next program.

This period between programs lasted for 20-30 seconds.

Now this period is lasting 5,6,7 minutes, which is full of adverts for the BBC.
 
People who are paying this licence fee DON'T want to see ads of any kind.
So BBC get your funding from somwhere else, instead of charging the poor british public to show your ads, try charging these multi million pound companies lots of money to show their ads instead.
